original_text: But when the first came, they supposed that they should have received more; and they likewise received every man a penny.
korean_text: 먼저 온 자들이 와서 더 받을 줄 알았더니 그들도 한 데나리온씩 받은지라

sentences.original_text: they supposed that they should have received more
and they likewise received every man a penny
sentences.korean_translation: 그들도 역시 각자 한 데나리온을 받았느니라
